plugins.name: architecture-advisor
plugins.description: Provides architectural guidance and design pattern recommendations.

plugins.name: architecture-gatekeeper
plugins.description: Comprehensive architecture validation plugin that prevents commits violating architecture patterns or creating circular dependencies.

plugins.name: api-doc-generator-plugin
plugins.description: Generates comprehensive API documentation from source code and OpenAPI specifications.

plugins.name: api-integration-generator
plugins.description: Generate fully-typed, error-handled API client code from OpenAPI/Swagger specifications or documentation.

plugins.name: api-security-hardening
plugins.description: Comprehensive API security hardening plugin providing CORS, CSRF, XSS protection, API key rotation, and JWT flow security.

plugins.name: aria-improver
plugins.description: Automatically suggests ARIA labels and semantic HTML improvements for better accessibility and SEO.

plugins.name: audit-trail-logger
plugins.description: Comprehensive audit trail logging for compliance reporting. Captures all file changes, commands, and decisions with timestamps and session tracking.

plugins.name: auto-doc-updater-plugin
plugins.description: Automatically detects code changes and suggests documentation updates.

plugins.name: auto-quality-gates
plugins.description: Comprehensive automated testing and quality gates configuration framework for Claude Code.

plugins.name: bundle-size-analyzer
plugins.description: A comprehensive Claude Code plugin for analyzing JavaScript/TypeScript bundle sizes and identifying tree-shaking opportunities.

plugins.name: ci-cd-pipeline-generator
plugins.description: Generates CI/CD pipelines for GitHub Actions, GitLab CI, and Jenkins with best practices and common patterns.

plugins.name: claude-code-api-doc-plugin
plugins.description: A comprehensive Claude Code plugin for generating API documentation portals with static sites, interactive explorers, code examples, SDK documentation, and changelogs.

plugins.name: claude-code-circular-deps-plugin
plugins.description: A Claude Code plugin (MCP server) that detects circular dependencies in TypeScript and JavaScript projects and provides actionable suggestions for fixing them.

plugins.name: claude-crud-generator
plugins.description: Generate complete CRUD operations from database schemas for multiple frameworks and languages.

plugins.name: claude-md-hook
plugins.description: Automatically includes your CLAUDE.md project rules with every user prompt.

plugins.name: claude-migration-generator
plugins.description: Generate database migrations from natural language schema descriptions across multiple ORMs and frameworks.

plugins.name: code-complexity-analyzer
plugins.description: A comprehensive Claude Code plugin that analyzes code complexity and provides intelligent refactoring suggestions to improve maintainability and readability.

plugins.name: code-migration-assistant
plugins.description: An intelligent Claude Code plugin for upgrading between framework versions and translating between programming languages.

plugins.name: commit-gen-plugin
plugins.description: Generates conventional commit messages based on staged changes.

plugins.name: compliance-assistant-plugin
plugins.description: A comprehensive compliance scanner plugin for Claude Code that detects GDPR, HIPAA, SOC2 violations and PII handling issues.

plugins.name: cross-repo-knowledge-navigator
plugins.description: An AI-powered knowledge navigator that searches across multiple repositories, Slack threads, Jira tickets, and Confluence docs to answer company-wide questions.

plugins.name: dead-code-hunter
plugins.description: A Claude Code plugin that scans codebases to identify unused code, zombie files, and stale configurations with safe removal and rollback support.

plugins.name: dependency-safety-scanner
plugins.description: Analyzes npm dependencies for vulnerabilities, bloat, and license issues.

plugins.name: deployment-strategies-plugin
plugins.description: Helps generate deployment strategies for various platforms.

plugins.name: diagram-generator-plugin
plugins.description: Generates architectural diagrams from code using Mermaid, PlantUML, or DOT formats. Analyzes project structure and automatically identifies components, dependencies, and relationships.

plugins.name: doc-onboarding-plugin
plugins.description: Generates onboarding documentation for new developers.

plugins.name: env-generator-plugin
plugins.description: A Claude Code plugin that automatically generates .env files by analyzing your codebase for environment variable usage patterns.

plugins.name: env-var-detect
plugins.description: Automatically detect missing environment variables in your codebase with this Claude Code plugin.

plugins.name: error-explainer
plugins.description: A Claude Code plugin that provides context and solutions for cryptic error messages.

plugins.name: gdpr-privacy-scanner
plugins.description: Production-ready GDPR compliance scanner with comprehensive PII detection, data retention validation, and consent management verification.

plugins.name: hook-test-plugin
plugins.description: A plugin for testing Claude Code hook functionality.

plugins.name: intelligent-refactoring-assistant
plugins.description: Safe, context-aware refactoring tools for modernizing legacy code, extracting duplicated logic, and applying design patterns with confidence.

plugins.name: mcp-json-setup
plugins.description: Manages Claude Code MCP server configurations.

plugins.name: memory-leak-detector-plugin
plugins.description: A Claude Code plugin that detects memory leaks and provides actionable suggestions for fixing them in JavaScript, TypeScript, and Python codebases.

plugins.name: memory-system-plugin
plugins.description: A Claude Code plugin for managing persistent memory across sessions for long-running AI assistance.

plugins.name: mock-api-server
plugins.description: Create, configure, and manage mock API servers for testing and development without backend dependencies.

plugins.name: multi-agent-orchestrator
plugins.description: Orchestrates multiple parallel AI agents for comprehensive code analysis, review, and automated fixes.

plugins.name: openapi-generator
plugins.description: A Claude Code plugin that automatically generates OpenAPI 3.0 and Swagger 2.0 specifications from your codebase.

plugins.name: optimization-suggester
plugins.description: Suggests code optimizations and improvements.

plugins.name: orm-sql-converter
plugins.description: A powerful Claude Code plugin for converting between ORM queries and raw SQL across multiple programming languages, frameworks, and database systems.

plugins.name: performance-profiler
plugins.description: Profiles and analyzes code performance.

plugins.name: pr-review-enforcer
plugins.description: Comprehensive PR and code review enforcement plugin ensuring PR descriptions, tests, and documentation exist before merge.

plugins.name: production-debugging-assistant
plugins.description: A Claude Code plugin that helps you correlate errors across logs, metrics, and traces during production incidents to identify root causes faster.

plugins.name: qa-assistant
plugins.description: Comprehensive quality assurance and production readiness checks including breaking change detection, code quality analysis, and security scanning.

plugins.name: review-squad-coordinator
plugins.description: Auto-assign code reviewers based on code ownership patterns, expertise analysis, and availability.

plugins.name: secrets-detection-hook
plugins.description: A security-focused Claude Code plugin that detects and blocks commands/files containing API keys, passwords, or personally identifiable information before execution.

plugins.name: security-scanner-plugin
plugins.description: A comprehensive security scanner plugin for Claude Code that detects common vulnerabilities, security misconfigurations, and provides actionable fix recommendations.

plugins.name: semantic-code-search
plugins.description: Transform how you find code by searching using natural language instead of exact keywords.

plugins.name: sql-query-optimizer
plugins.description: A comprehensive SQL query optimization plugin for Claude Code that analyzes, refactors, and optimizes complex SQL queries for better database performance.

plugins.name: style-guide-enforcer
plugins.description: A comprehensive Claude Code plugin for maintaining consistent code style and team conventions.

plugins.name: style-guide-plugin
plugins.description: A Claude Code plugin for accessing programming style guides and best practices with automatic fetching.

plugins.name: tavily-search-plugin
plugins.description: A Claude Code plugin for web search and research using Tavily AI search engine.

plugins.name: tech-debt-tracker
plugins.description: A comprehensive Claude Code plugin for identifying, tracking, and prioritizing technical debt in your codebase.

plugins.name: testing-assistant-plugin
plugins.description: Enterprise-grade testing assistant for Claude Code - automated test generation, edge case identification, and test quality improvement.

plugins.name: ticket-sync-hook
plugins.description: Automatically update Jira and Linear tickets based on git commit activity.

plugins.name: tribal-knowledge-extractor
plugins.description: Mines git history for context about code evolution, patterns, and team knowledge.

plugins.name: wcag-scanner-plugin
plugins.description: A comprehensive Claude Code plugin for scanning WCAG 2.2 compliance issues in web applications.
